title: Northtown Woods Home
posting_body: Beautiful modern Craftsman style home with open floor plan.
This home in a desirable Bainbridge neighborhood features 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, office on the main floor, high ceilings, Brazilian Walnut floors, slate flooring, stainless steel appliances.
2420 square feet heated by fireplace and forced air.
A large covered porch and attached garage.
Fenced in back yard with patio.
Easy access to schools, shops, ferry and other local businesses.
Please visit us at <URL> for more information and photos
